aka: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic "The Quest for the Rainbow Stone"

cast.name: 黛比·德里贝里 Debi Derryberry
瓦拉里·雷·米勒 Valarie Rae Miller

writer.name: 托马斯·克拉耶夫斯基 Thomas Krajewski

this_title: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic: The Quest for the Rainbow Stone
trans_title: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic "The Quest for the Rainbow Stone"
introduction: A new friend named Togetherness is about to become an official Care Bear in a fun ceremony. But Cheer gets so excited that she accidentally breaks the magical stone needed to give Togetherness her color.
chinese_title: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic: The Quest for the Rainbow Stone
